Posts.Content: Jul 20, 2013 02:17AM Warriormommy wrote: I am sorry to hear about your day and the news you heard. It is like you are in a bad dream. We did not sleep well the first few nights however it gets easier as time moves forward. The most difficult part is hearing the news and the next few weeks of tests will be tough but you will see it will pass. A new perspective at life will unfold and the silver lining will be seen each day. Just take it one day at a time...cry...hit a pillow when angry and remember to breath. I also found my faith in God became renewed and the peace from Him helped me out the most! MY prayers are wi th you.
Posts.Title: In shock bennymuffins websister
